replies.body:
When I finally enter a match as a Star Guardian

http://giant.gfycat.com/SoftElegantHadrosaurus.gif

The Star Guardians are currently engrossed in an end game saga among the stars.  Let your light shine bright and be their beacon home.  Keep an eye on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page, and they just may heed your call.  Praise be!
Looks very familiar!  Someone has a secret Star Guardian Identity {{champion:16}}
They better be coming today or I'm going to be very upset at you for raising my hopes. >;(

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=k9aRLbnX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-06T17:14:14.224+0000)

> The star guardians are currently engrossed in an end game saga among the stars.  Let your light shine bright and be their beacon home.  Keep an eye on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page, and they just may heed your call.  Praise be!
